Head Start
Making contributions to your IRA early in your career can have a big effect on your retirement savings.
Potential balance of Roth IRA at various ages, by starting age
Note: Annual Roth IRA contributions of $6,000 for ages 25-49 and $7,000 for ages 50 and over. Numbers assume an annual return rate of 7% and do not account for taxes or inflation.
